description: Explore Neitz Direct ophthalmoscopes, providing important diagnostic information. These tools reach the retina's complexity with a keen eye and a soft touch, illuminating diseases and directing clinical assessments. Their accuracy and flexibility enable medical practitioners to reveal issues that could otherwise go unnoticed, from eye assessments to retinal exams. It provides an in-depth insight into eye health and is essential for maintaining eyesight and improving patient treatment.
name: Direct Ophthalmoscopes
